game.name: Maltese's Fluffy Onsen
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Run a bathhouse visited by animals! Maltese's Fluffy Onsen is a relaxing simulation game that you can enjoy while doing other tasks, as it sits at the bottom of your screen. Place baths with different temperatures and rest areas to help a variety of animal friends unwind.
